data.text: @CityNewsVAN The Vaccine is a poison people, do not take the jab. It is population Controle by the WEF agenda, moving forward. They say the world is over populated. Just use common sense.
@CityNewsVAN This province is so backwards. Get with the times already.

@CityNewsVAN Vaccines don't eliminate spread. Mandating already short health fields is going to create a  more dire health care issue... Pro vaxxers are not truly aware, they'll be also feeling this... For mandating a failed treatment.... One that still allows spread, fictional saftey.

@CityNewsVAN Please help me understand this. There is so much misinformation. Does the unvaccinated spread Covid quicker and easier to other people? What is the danger to the vaccinated from the unvaccinated that we are treating them this way?
@eastEndRatz @CityNewsVAN They were temporary and already lifted in the rest if canada, in bc they will last a lot longer i'm afraid (with much lower cases than other provinces)
@mikeyb_35 @CityNewsVAN So if your job mandated you something you don't like then you would also leave without complain right? Simple as that
@CityNewsVAN While the rest of canada (and most of the world) lifted vaccine passports, BC is adding more restrictions to them ,what a freaking communist province
@CityNewsVAN How absolutely ridiculous this province is. What a disgrace to Canada.. #EndTheMandatesNow give people their jobs back.  Scamdemic is over
@CityNewsVAN BC has until the end of the month to drop all vaccine passports before we the people drag them out of office.
